channel.title: [ We need you! ] New-World [ We need you! ]
channel.description:
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hoxllh.png[/img] [b][size=18pt]DEVELOPMENT THREAD:[/size][/b]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,566899.0.html [b][size=18pt]DEVELOPMENT TEAM THREAD:[/size][/b]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,567032.0.html [b][size=18pt]WEBSITE: [/size][/b]http://engrid-reborn.netai.net/index.php [b][size=18pt]WE ARE PI BASED [/size][/b] [b][size=18pt]NOTE WE WILL BE RELEASING ALPHA SOON! [/size][/b] [b][size=18pt]TESTING IS OUT FOR EVERY ONE![/size][/b] Not much to say but we are in testing stage and will be having a spawn event soon we need players / testers the alpha will be out soon! Almost all skills are 100% complete! There will be f2p and p2p sometime in the alpha we hope if not it will be in beta! [b]P2P/F2P WILL NOT BE ADDED UNTILL WE GET 20-30+ ACTIVE PLAYERS ON![/b] i will post some pics below but make sure to check are the development thread to see how the server is going!

item.title: [ We need you! ] New-World [ We need you! ]
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:464051”]Don’t like the sight of seeing a development thread only about a week ago, then seeing an advertisement, shows you didn’t do much work. Oh well, good luck.[/quote]Yes… i see what your saying but ive already had alot of stuff added to this source before i made the development thread and its only out for testing. And we need players for that so im doing what ever i can to do that but any ways thanks for at lest saying good luck lol

Read full topic
item.source: [ We need you! ] New-World [ We need you! ]

item.title: [ We need you! ] New-World [ We need you! ]

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Don’t like the sight of seeing a development thread only about a week ago, then seeing an advertisement, shows you didn’t do much work. Oh well, good luck.

item.title: [ We need you! ] New-World [ We need you! ]
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

i see nothing unique in this at all except you have to be members to do thing that in all other servers you get free…alot of players play rsps because they cant buy real rs membership…im sorry to say this but it looks like a fail to me. but i still wish you luck and i hope it goes better than i foresee it.

Read full topic

[size=18pt]WE ARE PI BASED [/size]
[size=18pt]NOTE WE WILL BE RELEASING ALPHA SOON! [/size]
[size=18pt]TESTING IS OUT FOR EVERY ONE![/size]
Not much to say but we are in testing stage and will be having a spawn event soon we need players / testers the alpha will be out soon!
Almost all skills are 100% complete!
There will be f2p and p2p sometime in the alpha we hope if not it will be in beta! P2P/F2P WILL NOT BE ADDED UNTILL WE GET 20-30+ ACTIVE PLAYERS ON!
